info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.known_label_key
info.description:
Known label key serves two purposes

   It lets users declare label keys so that they can be consistently used across their namespaces. Declared label keys can be used by the Web UI in drop down. Description field in the label lets everyone know what this label key means.
   System allocates unique integer (ID) values for known label keys. These ID(s) along with the IDs allocated for known labels are used in Network Policy or Service Policy enforcement. Hence only Known labels and known label keys can be used in Network Policy or L7 Policy.

post.description: Create creates a new label key in shared namespace. Any other namespace requested will return error

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

parameters.name: namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace

x-example: "value"
Namespace in which to create label key

post.description: Delete will delete a given label key label key from current tenants shared namespace

get.description:
Get is generic label key query. Two types of queries are supported
   Return label with exact matching entry label key.
   Return list of labels that have prefix of label key .
Returns list of label keys. Query will look into current tenants shared namespace and ves-io shared.

Generic Get of all available labels for a given tenant
Get exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)

known_label_keyQueryType.description:
x-displayName: "Query Type"
Type of label key query

 - QUERY_ALL_LABEL_KEYS: x-displayName: "All Labels"
Generic Get of all available labels for a given tenant
 - QUERY_EXACT_LABEL_KEY: x-displayName: "Exact Label Key"
Get exact match of label.key = label.value Or label.key(label.value)
 - QUERY_PREFIX_LABEL_KEYS: x-displayName: "Label Key Prefix"
Get prefix match of label.key
known_label_keyQueryType.title: QueryType
